description: This file defines a reusable, themed IconButton component using LightningJS. It includes detailed styling, state management, and interactivity logic for the button, including focus, hover, active, and disabled states.

classes.name: IconButton
classes.description: A reusable, themed icon button component with various interaction states implemented using LightningJS.

methods.name: _construct
methods.description: Initializes component state and default properties.

methods.name: props (getter and setter)
methods.description: Manages component props, allowing external configuration.

methods.name: _applyProps
methods.description: Applies property changes to update component styling and behavior.

methods.name: _focus
methods.description: Handles component focus event, shows focus ring.

methods.name: _unfocus
methods.description: Handles component unfocus event, hides focus ring.

methods.name: _handleEnter
methods.description: Handles activation (click or Enter key), triggers onClick callback.

methods.name: _handleClick
methods.description: Triggers _handleEnter to handle click events.

methods.name: _handleMouseEnter
methods.description: Handles mouse enter, triggers hover state.

methods.name: _handleMouseLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leave, resets hover and pressed states.

methods.name: _handleMouseDown
methods.description: Handles mouse down, triggers pressed visual state.

methods.name: _handleMouseUp
methods.description: Handles mouse up, resets pressed visual state.

methods.name: _template()
methods.description: Defines the component's visual structure and initial properties.
